trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Vacaville
There was one other sighting in Vacaville on or around July 21st 2012
Summary: Appeared out of the western sky, clear cloudless night going to the South East . 5 groups of 3 with about a 2 min interval between group. Watch come from the horizon, then shoot straight up out of sight a few mind later. Next group repeated same. Then 1
divs: Sighting DetailsThey came out of the West proceeding to the south east over the horizon. Groups of 3 orange glowing objects gaining altitude. Observed for about 2. Mins then they accelerated straight up. Next group appeared and. Repeated as the other ones left. Repeated For 5 groups and then one single followed. All crickets dogs etc absolutely quiet
